pair.error_notAQuattDevice: A manual IP address has been entered, but this does not appear to be a Quatt device. Please check the IP address and try again.

manual.title: Enter Quatt CiC IP Address
manual.description: Automatic discovery failed, please enter the IP address of your Quatt CiC below.

error.ipChangeSuspected: Suspected IP address change. Please check device settings if it remains unavailable.
